alert.note: Alert for Burnett (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 6:29PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pine and southwestern Burnett Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 629 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pine City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Grantsburg around 640 PM CDT. Branstad around 645 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.
